name: Pompeii (mcbate1, ISU CTK Game Design)
description:
Pompeii was a game that I made in my first game development course at ISU, the focus of the game was to make quick and responsive game play driven by player input. Had a lot of fun making this project, and one of my favorites made in a class to date.

Only level 1 is available here, but if people like it enough, I would be happy to make a couple more!
